alert.note: Alert for Clark (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 11:15PM CDT until April 12 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR CLARK...SOUTHEASTERN PIKE...NORTHWESTERN DALLAS AND SOUTHWESTERN HOT SPRING COUNTIES... At 1115 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Richwoods, or 10 miles southwest of Arkadelphia, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Gurdon... Caddo Valley... Okolona... Beirne... Gum Springs in Clark County... Richwoods... DeGray Lake State Park... Halfway... Friendship... Bismarck... Burtsell... Lower Lake Recreation Area... Curtis... Joan... Hollywood... Willow... Dalark... Griffithtown... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 53 and 83. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
